title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A major power outage is reported in Spain and Portugal, disabling their capitals

items.title: Conclave to choose the next pope starts May 7, Vatican says

items.title: DHL reverses course and resumes shipping packages valued over $800 to U.S. consumers
items.description: The policy reversal comes one week after the global shipping company said it would halt such shipments due to new U.S. customs rules.

items.title: IBM announces $150 billion investment in U.S. manufacturing, research

items.title: Former Memphis officers to face second trial in beating death of Tyre Nichols

items.description: It is a "very critical" week for the White House and its involvement, Secretary of State Marco Rubio tells US media.

items.title: Large parts of Spain and Portugal hit by massive power outage
items.description: A widespread power outage hit Spain and Portugal, which have a combined population of over 50 million people.

items.title: Conclave to elect new pope to begin on 7 May, Vatican says
items.description: The closed-door meeting will begin in the Sistine Chapel and will involve some 135 cardinals from across the world.

items.description: Ukraine calls for an "immediate" ceasefire of at least 30 days in response.
